names.name: Tägoga Däbrä Nazret Qǝddus Yoḥannǝs / TNY

towns.town: wäräda Dägʿa Tämben, ṭabiya Däbrä Nazret, qušät Tägoga

founders.founder: Local tradition claims that the church was founded by Zä-Mikaʾel ʾArägawi (6th cent.), and re-established as monastery by Yoḥannǝs IV (r. 1872-89).

conditions.condition: Gädam. The comunity includes not more than 10 monks. A church dedicated to Täklä Haymanot, associated with the monastery, is located in the vicinity. Tabots (4): Kidanä Mǝḥrät, Zä-Mikaʾel ʾArägawi, Yoḥannǝs Wäldä Nägwädgwad (John the Evangelist), Täklä Haymanot.

descriptions.description: 43 Mss. photographed: TNY-001 ʺThe Miracles of Maryʺ; TNY-002 ʺ Four Gospelsʺ; TNY-003 ʺFour Gospelsʺ; TNY-004 ʺ1) The Book of Hours 2) Psalterʺ; TNY-005 ʺMiracles of Maryʺ; TNY-006 ʺThe Faith of the Fathersʺ; TNY-007 ʺThe Collection of Imagesʺ; TNY-008 ʺ1) The Book of Henoch 2) The Book of Job 3)Provebrs 4) The Book of King Iʺ; TNY-009 ʺPraise of Godʺ; TNY-010 ʺPauline Epistlesʺ; TNY-011 ʺ1) Epistles (of Paul and Catholic) 2) Acts of Apostles 3) Apocalipse of the Johnʺ; TNY-012 ʺThe History of Kingsʺ; TNY-013 ʺProphetsʺ; TNY-014 ʺThe Book of the History of the Galla and other textoʺ; TNY-015 ʺSmall Prophetesʺ; TNY-016 ʺTeachings of fathers (monastic)ʺ; TNY-017 ʺDeggwaʺ; TNY-018 ʺEpistles of St. Paul (incomplete at the beginning and at the end)ʺ; TNY-019 ʺThe Story of Maryʺ; TNY-020 ʺFour Gospelsʺ; TNY-021 ʺThe Faith of the Fathersʺ; TNY-022 ʺVitae of the Apostlesʺ; TNY-023 ʺVita of Kirosʺ; TNY-025 ʺThe Organ of the Praiseʺ; TNY-026 ʺThe Book of the Funeral Riteʺ; TNY-027 ʺAbushakerʺ; TNY-028 ʺPraise of Godʺ; TNY-029 ʺThe Praise of Godʺ; TNY-030 ʺMiracles of Jesusʺ; TNY-031 ʺSpiritual Elder (with commentary in Amharic)ʺ; TNY-032 ʺPsalterʺ TNY-033 ʺPsalterʺ; TNY-034 ʺSynaxarion (first half of the years)ʺ; TNY-035 ʺSynaxarion (the second half of the years)ʺ; TNY-036 ʺVita of Arägawiʺ; TNY-037 ʺGrammar of Gǝʿǝzʺ; TNY-038 ʺVita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddusʺ; TNY-039 ʺPsalterʺ; TNY-040 ʺPsalterʺ; TNY-041ʺVita of Haymanotʺ; TNY-042 ʺDeggwa for Lentʺ; TNY-043 ʺDeggwa of the Lentʺ; TNY-044 ʺThe Praise of Maryʺ
